## Properties

| Property             | Attribute    | Description                                                                                                 | Type                                             | Default                  |
| -------------------- | ------------ | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------ | ------------------------ |
| `display`            | `display`    | Component display orientation                                                                               | `DisplayType.HORIZONTAL \| DisplayType.VERTICAL` | `DisplayType.HORIZONTAL` |
| `identifier`         | `identifier` | Identifier is used for the element ID (id is a reserved prop in Stencil.js) If not set, it will be created. | `string`                                         | `createID(this.name)`    |
| `label` _(required)_ | `label`      | Menu label. Include short menu description. Required for accessibility                                      | `string`                                         | `undefined`              |
